metadata.title: CVE-2017-5563 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
LibTIFF version 4.0.7 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer over-read intif_lzw.c resulting in DoS or code execution via a crafted bmp image totools/bmp2tiff.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5563` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9').
